DOC.brief_summary: This study compare physiological effect two isoenergetic , nutrient-controlled diet differ glycemic index . The diet study obese adult 10-day crossover feed trial .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Index CVD : Crossover Feeding Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare physiological effect two isoenergetic , nutrient-controlled diet differ glycemic index . The diet study obese male adult 10-day crossover feed trial . Hypothesis : Obese subject show improvement clinical endpoint associate risk diabetes cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) consume control low ( compare high ) glycemic index diet 10 day . 1º endpoint : insulin sensitivity measure modify Frequently Sampled Intravenous Glucose Tolerance Test ( FSIVGTT ) . 2º endpoint : CVD risk factor ; postprandial study oxidative stress ; thermic effect food .
DOC.criteria: age 18 35 year male BMI ≥ 27 ≤45 kg/m2 willingness refrain alcohol caffeinated beverage consumption duration study major medical illness abnormal screen laboratory test take prescription medication might affect body weight current smoking ( 1 cigarette last 7 day ) consume special diet
